metadata.name: वधु -Vadhu (The bride) #1/13
metadata.description:
Its her big day. She is entering into a beautiful phase of womanhood. Being a wife,  she is ready to take yet another responsibility .Its mix of emotions that she is carrying in her soul right now. Desire in her eyes ,lot of excitement in her face and a little fear too. However, that glow on her face is saying that she is looking forward for this with all her heart and soul.

Womanhood is a blessing , how woman carries every phase of her life so courageously and gracefully has always  fascinated me . Through my self portrait, I am portraying this beautiful phase and the emotions of becoming part of someone.  

License : Primary NFT holder is free to use in advertising, display privately and in groups, including virtual galleries, documentaries and essays by holder of the NFT, as long as creator is credited. Provides no rights to create commercial merchandise, commercial
